titleStmt.title: The answer of the Commission of Generall Assemblie to the quæree propounded to them from the Parliament with an answer of the Commission of the Generall Assemblie to a letter, sent to them from the ministers of the Presbyterie of Sterline.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Ker, A.
